com.stoyanr.mastermind

Class DefaultPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stoyanr.mastermind.DefaultPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player

    public class DefaultPlayer
extends Object
implements Player
    A Player implementation for "computer" players that interact with a Game directly. Does not perform any initialization or cleanup, and always scores the passed guess correctly against the code passed upon construction.
    Author:
    Stoyan Rachev

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultPlayer(Mastermind mastermind, String code)
      Creates a new computer player with the given game setup and code.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endGame(boolean won, int roundsPlayed)
      For computer players, this method doesn't do anything.
      Score getScore(String guess)
      Scores the passed guess correctly against the code passed upon construction, by delegating to Mastermind.evaluateScore(String, String).
      void startGame()
      For computer players, this method doesn't do anything.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultPlayer

        public DefaultPlayer(Mastermind mastermind,
             String code)
        Creates a new computer player with the given game setup and code.
        Parameters:
        mastermind - The game setup to use.
        code - The code against which all guesses will be scored. It has to be a valid code for the passed game setup.

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public final void startGame()
        For computer players, this method doesn't do anything.
        Specified by:
        startGame in interface Player

      • endGame

        public final void endGame(boolean won,
           int roundsPlayed)
        For computer players, this method doesn't do anything.
        Specified by:
        endGame in interface Player
        Parameters:
        won - true if the game has been won, false otherwise.
        roundsPlayed - The number of rounds played during the game.

      • getScore

        public final Score getScore(String guess)
        Scores the passed guess correctly against the code passed upon construction, by delegating to Mastermind.evaluateScore(String, String).
        Specified by:
        getScore in interface Player
        Parameters:
        guess - The guess to provide a score for.
        Returns:
        The score for the passed guess.
